manage.text1: Authy 2-Factor Authentication をダウンロードした後、画面中のQRコードをスキャナーして、移動設備とハッシュムズウェブページ間の安定的なリングを建設します。QRコードをスキャナーすると、6桁の数字が現れ、この数字は1分ごとに変化します。下記の空白で見た6桁の数字を入力してください。
manage.text2: 備考：電話と連携した後、アカウントをログインするたびに、6桁の数字を入力する必要です。

faq.title: よくある質問
faq.tab2: アカウントの関係問題
faq.tab1_title2: メンテナンス料金はいくらですか？
faq.tab1_title3: 助けが必要な場合は、どうすれば連絡することができますか？
faq.tab1_title4: Pinnacle Miningの払い戻しポリシーとは何ですか？
faq.tab1_title5: Bitcoin採掘設備とは何ですか？
faq.tab1_title6: Bitcoinウォレットを設定するにはどうすればよいですか？
faq.tab2_title1: パスワードを探し戻す方法？
faq.tab2_title3: 引き出す記録は複数な財布アドレスがあります、なぜですか？
faq.tab2_title4: OTP検証コードは使用できません。どうすればいいですか？
faq.tab2_title5: 領収書に「Pending」という知らせがありますが、なぜですか？
faq.tab2_title6: 売り出しを登録した内容は正常的に反映できません、なぜですか？
faq.tab2_title7: 手当は漏れているものがあります、なぜですか？
faq.tab3_title1: どれぐらい儲けますか？
faq.tab3_title2: 採掘手当はどうやって支払いますか？
faq.tab3_title3: どんな頻度でビットコインを獲得できますか？
faq.tab3_title4: 採掘はいつから始めますか？
faq.tab3_title5: 採掘数量はどんな因子に影響されますか？
faq.tab3_title6: わたしのビットコインは期限がどれぐらいですか？
faq.tab3_title7: 頂峰鉱場は投資収益を保証できますか？
faq.tab3_title8: 採掘プランを購入する場合、どれぐらいの採掘手当をもらえますか？
faq.tab1_content1:
Pinnacle Mining offers Bitcoin mining without buying any equipment. Instead, you are buying mining packages from our data centers located in the US, Canada, and Europe.

Pinnacle Mining was created to allow professionals and newcomers similar access to the same quality resources as the industrial miners to enable effective and efficient mining. Our cooperation with the industry leaders and access to the newest and most advanced technologies in the industry, quickly made us one of the world leading mining services.

To join Pinnacle Mining, you must be able to pay with either Bitcoin or Ethereum. We do not accept anything other than Bitcoin and Ethereum, so depending on the country you live in, you must convert your currency into Bitcoin or Ethereum and then use the Bitcoin or Ethereum to sign up for Pinnacle Mining. We price everything in USD to have a standard price for our products, but we do not accept USD or any other fiat currency.

To start, you will need to pay a one-time $99 membership fee that will give you lifetime access to our platform. As a member, you'll be able to purchase any of our mining packages and participate in all other opportunities that we provide in the future.
faq.tab1_content2:
The maintenance fee covers all costs related to mining, including, but not limited to:

  • Electricity costs
  • Cooling systems
  • Maintenance work
  • Hosting services
faq.tab1_content4: 当社は、当社の報酬構造および鉱業収入の払い戻しのスピードにより、厳格な払い戻し方針はない。 ほとんどの場合、明らかに間違いがない限り、何らかの理由で払い戻しを受けることはできません。 また、この払い戻し請求は、支払いの最初の72時間以内に、または3つの完全な支払いサイクルが支払われる前に行われなければなりません。 この時間以降に払い戻しをリクエストされた場合、払い戻しを行うことはできません。
faq.tab1_content5:
鉱山設備は、ハッシュ関数を実行するようにカスタマイズされた特殊なコンピュータハードウェアに使用される用語です。 これらのマシンを一緒につなぎ、Bitcoinネットワークに接続することができます。 採掘装置は、ハッシュ関数を処理するように設計されたASICチップです。 残りの「機器」は、チップを冷却し、チップに電力を供給するために使用されます。

当社は、すべてのPinnacleメンバーに代わって購買力を活用するための新しい機器を継続的に購入しています。 私たちが購入する鉱夫のほとんどは、世界中の鉱山機械の＃1売り手であるBitmainからのものです。 私たちは彼らとの関係を構築しており、これにより優先価格を取得し、新しいサーバーのラックを展開することができます。 さらに、Bitmainを使用して旧式の鉱山設備の一部を流通市場で清算することができ、利益を最大化することができます。
faq.tab1_content6:
ウォレットを設定するためのさまざまなオプションが用意されています。使用する銀行の決定に似ています。 ほとんどの財布は同じサービスを提供しており、自由に使用できますので、あなたのニーズに合ったものを選ぶ必要があります。 また、ウォレットをコンピュータに保存したり、オフラインで紙財布にしたりすることもできます。 セキュリティは、財布を選択する際に最も重要なことです。 いくつかの一般的なサードパーティ製の財布です：

  • Blockchain - ベストと私たちのお気に入り！
  • Xapo - ソリッドセキュリティ、グローバルソリューションであり、金庫を提供します。
  • Coinbase - 最大の財布。
  • BitStamp - EU銀行の電線とEUのお客様に最適です。
  • Bitcoin.org - 財布を選択するためのもう1つの優れたリソース。
faq.tab2_content1:
In order to restore your password:

  1. Click on “LOGIN”
  2. Click on the “Forgot username or password?” link
  3. Enter your email
  4. Complete the CAPTCHA
  5. Click “Send”

You will receive an email with further step by step instructions
faq.tab2_content2:
The address will be different for each cryptocurrency (BTC / ETH). Please make sure you have the correct address saved before making a withdrawal request. Each wallet will have a separate area to input and save your address.

To make a withdrawal request, you'll need to enter the destination address, withdrawal address, amount to send, and OTP Authorization Code.

To prevent an “Insufficient Funds Error,” please make sure you are not going over the limit of what you currently have in the credit wallet. With Bitcoin, there is a 0.002 BTC fee that must be accounted for on withdrawals less than 2 BTC.
faq.tab2_content3: Members’ withdrawal requests are combined to optimize and increase the speed of transactions.
faq.tab2_content4:
To set up your Google Authenticator (GA) App:

  1. Log in and go to your My Profile section under the My Account tab.
  2. Scroll down to the bottom of the page, and change Disable to Enable.
  3. A QR code will appear. You will need to scan this code with your smartphone or app-capable device to receive your Google Authenticator code.
  4. The Google Authenticator code on your device will be used to access your account.
  5. The app will confirm that the time has been synced, and you should now be able to use your verification codes to sign in. The synchronization will only affect the internal time of your Google Authenticator app and will not change your device's Date & time settings.
faq.tab2_content5: When you send Bitcoin from your wallet to the BTC address provided on the invoice, the transaction must be verified by the network six times before it is confirmed and accepted. This process typically takes anywhere from 10 minutes to 1 hour. Once we receive the 6th confirmation, your invoice will be marked as paid and commissions will follow. In some cases, it might take 3-4 hours to get six confirmations if you are using a wallet that allows you to set a mining fee to zero. If you set the mining fee high (standard is .0001 BTC), you will get confirmations quickly.
faq.tab2_content6: If you do not see the payment reflected on the account, your payment to the invoice may be short. The exact amount of Bitcoin will need to be paid to avoid any errors. If you find that your payment is insufficient, you will need to send in a support ticket for further assistance.
faq.tab2_content7:
Any commissions made from a mining package you do not own will be sent to held commissions. For example, if you own hash power from Mining Package 1 but not Mining Packages 2, 3, or 4, then the commissions from your downline that come from Mining Packages 2, 3, and 4 are sent to a held commissions section and will not credit your wallet.

If you have held commissions accumulating for a mining package, you must first purchase that full package to receive those commissions. Alternatively, if you enable the “Automatic Package Upgrade” option, then the accumulating BTC will stay there until there is enough Bitcoin value to make a full package purchase of that particular mining package.

Example: If you are accumulating held commissions in Mining Package 2, a $3000 value would need to be exceeded before a full mining package is automatically purchased. From this point, any future commissions would go directly into the credit wallet.
faq.tab3_content1: Your daily earnings depend on many unpredictable factors such as block reward, mining difficulty, and blocks mined. However, we assure you that all mined Bitcoins are automatically added to your balance each day. Please note that because our payout is based on overall network hash rate, we recommend all of our members to do their research and their own earning calculations.
faq.tab3_content2:
We pay mining earnings every day! However, when you first purchase any mining package, you will not start earning Bitcoins for ten days. This short preparatory time not only allows us to stabilize the payout, but it also gives us time to purchase and install new equipment. After these initial ten days, you begin earning bitcoin daily for 1,000 days (the contract term).

Maintenance Fees & Repurchases: Each day you will earn a percentage of Bitcoin mined that will be instantly available for you to withdraw. You will also see another portion automatically held to cover maintenance fees and for purchasing new mining equipment. There is a minimum percentage for each package, and these holdover amounts are automatically redeemed in the form of partial hash repurchases. You will see your total hash power increase for 1,000 days as you pay back a percentage each day.
faq.tab3_content3:
Newly mined Bitcoins are credited to your balance once per day for the previous mining day.

Our minimum withdrawal amount is 0.005 BTC. You can request a withdrawal at any time.
faq.tab3_content4: Mining starts automatically at 00:00 UTC. Mined Bitcoins are credited automatically to the member’s credit wallet once a day for the previous mining day.
faq.tab3_content5: The number of bitcoins that can be mined and circulated is limited. As more miners join the network, mining difficulty gets increased and requires additional time for mining. The amount of Bitcoins credited to your balance each day is also influenced by the BTC/USD exchange rate, as the maintenance cost of the contract pays in USD. We'll also need to sell some part of mined bitcoins due to the Coindesk BPI daily closing price for its covering. Thus, the higher the BTC price, the less you need to pay for the maintenance and the more you’ll earn.
faq.tab3_content6: We can guarantee that you will only receive newly mined Bitcoins. You can check the age of your Bitcoins on blockchain.info by putting in the transaction ID that you receive after your withdrawal from our service. Thus, everyone can be confident that we are indeed mining Bitcoins and that we are not an elaborate Ponzi scheme.
faq.tab3_content7:
It is crucial to understand that we DO NOT guarantee that any mining package will have a set return. You will never hear us make any claims about how much you will earn from a mining package because it’s impossible to know. Bitcoin mining is very complex, and with the difficulty level continually moving up every ten days and new hashing power always entering the space, there is no way anyone can accurately predict an ROI (especially with our business model that requires repurchases and maintenance fees).

NOTE: If you find a company offering you a set return (especially if they claim to be cloud mining and provide 100% or more), there is a high probability they are a Ponzi scheme. Real hardware actually backs some cloud miners, but their power is virtual and therefore very hard to track. The sad reality is you will never know if a cloud mining company is actually mining, so we recommend you steer clear unless they are very transparent. We are NOT a cloud mining company. Everything we have can be verified!
faq.tab3_content8: When you purchase a mining package, it will not start earning right away. It will begin after a ten-day holding period for confirmation and placement. After the holding period, your hash power will begin earning you Bitcoin daily. The contract duration of each mining package is 1,000 days and will terminate at that time unless you renew your contract.

enroll.chk: 本人は本プロジェクトを十分に了解し、そして、個人的な意志で登録及び購入します。同時に、会社の政策、条款を同意し、購入する商品が返品不可及び推薦人と援助人が変更しない事実をはっきりと了解しました。
enroll.newAcc: 新しいアカウントを開設します

bonusPlan:
Compensation Plan

A simple but powerful reward plan for everybody

We are excited to have you mining with us,and we look forward to helping you secure your financial future.Our platform is designed to multiply your cryptocurrency earnings with ease and is powered by a transparent earning structure to drive success.Pinnacle Mining has quickly become one of the largest crowdfunded Bitcoin mining pools in the world,and our facilities boast only the latest in mining technology.

By combining this expansion with our carefully engineered compensation model,you have an opportunity to leverage your earning potential like never before.Sharing our vision with others has compounding benefits and can be a powerful supplement to your earnings.

Best of all,you can participate at a level that’s comfortable foryou,all while creating passive and exponential income.

Daily Mining Payouts

Earn brand new coins from world-class miningfarms every day

As a leader in the cryptocurrency miningindustry,Pinnacle Mining provides convenient and affordable options forexperienced miners and excited newcomers alike.Our entire miningcatalog backs 1000-day contracts and is committed to consistent technology upgrades to ensure maximum efficiency.

When miningwith us,there’s no need to deal with loud fans,maintain expensive equipment,or manage high electricity costs.Our experts handle all of the logistical overhead foryou and make sure you’re up and running on day one.

After ten days of purchasing hash power from any of our miningpackages,you'll begin earning daily payouts to your wallet (larger packages will receive an additional mining bonus). In order to keep your earnings consistent with mining difficulty, our unique growth model automatically uses a small percentage of your profits to pay for mining costs and reinvest in more hardware equipment.The rate forthese repurchases can be adjusted in your back office(we recommend a 100%repurchase rate forbeginners).

PACKAGEP 1P 2P 3P 4P 5P 6P 7P 8GPU
Membership$99(One time)
Price$1,000$3,000$5,000$12,000$25,000$50,000$75,000$100,000$3,000
MiningStarts next day of purchasing a miningpackage
Daily Payout$2$6$10$24$50$100$150$200$6
Pay CycleEvery 200days

Ranking System

Earn status and achievements

Pinnacle utilizes a seven-tier ranking system designed to recognize your achievements and status within the company.The higher your rank,the bigger your bonuses and the deeper you earn through your entire team.

Rewards Program

Bonus income through member referrals

1.Direct Sponsor Bonus

You can begin enrolling new members once you are an active member and purchase a package.You'll earn an 10% sponsor bonus from every package your directly referred members purchase. For example, when B purchases package 1, 2, and 3, A the sponsor of B receives 10% of the total purchase price as the Direct Sponsor Bonus

2.Indirect Sponsor Bonus

Sponsor matching pays an extra20%fora maximum of 15levels(generations)of your enrollment tree depending on your rank.For example,when B11,sponsored by B1,purchases package 2($3,000),B1 receives 2%($60)of the purchase price as the Indirect Sponsor Bonus.Same thing happens to A the sponsor of B1.
